message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1200000. It's a great deal for both of us, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the price of $1200000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your financial constraints, but $950000 is still quite a bit below what I need to make this deal work. I'm willing to come down to $1100000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset for you. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to increase my offer to $1000000. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while staying within my budget constraints. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but it's still a bit below what I need to make this deal work. I'm willing to come down to $1050000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset for you. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. After further review, I am willing to increase my offer to $1025000. I believe this price is fair and within my budget, while also reflecting the value of the product. I hope this revised offer meets your needs.
